name: Pest Prevention
description: Keep unwanted guests out of your home.

templates.name: Termite Inspection
templates.description: Check for signs of wood-destroying insects.
instructions: Inspect foundation for mud tubes.
Check wood touching the ground.
Look for discarded wings on windowsills.
Tap wood with a screwdriver to check for hollowness.

templates.name: Check Exterior Vents for Screens
templates.description: Ensure animals cannot enter attic or crawlspace.
instructions: Inspect all roof, soffit, and dryer vents.
Ensure mesh screens are intact.
Repair holes with hardware cloth.
Remove bird nests if present (check laws first).

templates.name: Seal Exterior Cracks/Gaps
templates.description: Block entry points for mice and insects.
instructions: Inspect where pipes and wires enter the house.
Fill gaps with steel wool and expanding foam.
Caulk cracks in foundation or siding.
Check weatherstripping on doors.

templates.name: Inspect Attic for Rodents
templates.description: Check for droppings or insulation damage.
instructions: Enter attic with a bright light.
Look for droppings, nests, or tunnels in insulation.
Check for chewed wires.
Smell for urine odors.

templates.name: Clean Trash Bins
templates.description: Remove food residue that attracts pests.
instructions: Rinse bins with a hose.
Scrub with hot soapy water or bleach solution.
Rinse thoroughly and let dry upside down.
Sprinkle baking soda in the bottom to absorb odors.

templates.name: Ant Prevention Treatment
instructions: Spray perimeter of foundation with ant defense product.
Treat door thresholds and window sills.
Trim trees/bushes touching the house.
Remove standing water sources.

templates.name: Mosquito Control Check
instructions: Empty standing water from pots, bird baths, and toys.
Clean gutters to ensure flow.
Treat ponds with mosquito dunks.
Keep grass trimmed.
